message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be incredibly valuable for you.  I'm asking for $11,500.  What do you think?
Thank you for offering the product, Alice. I appreciate the value it provides. I am willing to pay $10,000 for it.
I understand your position, Bob, but $10,000 is below its true value.  How about we meet in the middle at $10,750?
I respect your valuation of the product, Alice. I'm still committed to finding a fair price. My counteroffer is $10,500.
